channel.title: Have a Shexy Pahty
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Have a Shexy Pahty" - What are the odds of landing that sannin?!

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded:
YES. FINALLY.

Thanks for the advice, everyone. I really appreciate it.

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded:
While Spot and the "Let the Dogs Out" team bonus together with EDUT make it easier to find allies this way, this doesn't necessarily mean that it's an auto-get, EVEN if it worked for you on your first try. I know because trying it that way, I failed to get Triple H from the Training Missions while we had them.

Just trying to keep in mind the possiblities here, though. Doing that would give you the best chance to get this annoying ally.

Also, the Ichi Special Ramen helps as well, if you're still trying to get him. If you already got him, then good job :D

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded: Have spot in your party and use EDUT and he is an auto find. That is the way i got him on my first try.

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded:
It would be awesome if I already had him and was just missing it for some reason, but I seriously don't have him… and I meant 'general' when I said I was spamming 'gen' missions… but then again, with 'genjutsu', I can see where the confusion would lie… and I really hope that wasn't just a pun because if it was, I might have to do the honorable thing.

I think the reason it irritates me so much is because my Legacy and Red-eye alts both landed him either on the first try or within the first few days… and my white-eye character was the first one I made back in February. It's making me a little stabbity.

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded: You are "spamming gen B-ranks" and should do general missions. He is rare and only found by doing general B-ranks.

item.title: Re: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded: Last time I heard of someone having this problem, they didn't realize that they already had J-Diddy.

item.title: Have a Shexy Pahty
item.content:encoded:
I've been spamming gen B-ranks with my white-eye alt trying to get that perv to join my team. I have a couple of problems here. NOTHING I DO WILL GET HIM. I've tried white-eye AND EDUT with no luck! That says to me that the odds are less than 10%…

and also, why is it that my white-eye alt can't get him, when the others have had him for WEEKS ;_; ~sorrow~

argh.
